'''"Masters of the Night-Wind" Reputation EXP''' can be acquired by completing the [[Masters of the Night-Wind]] [[Tribal Chronicles]], [[World Quest]]s and [[Exploration]] in the [[Tezcatepetonco Range]], and various [[Bounty|Bounties]] and [[Supply Notice]]s for the ''Masters of the Night-Wind''.
